be.def: to exist or live; used to describe the identity or qualities of a person or thing

example.en: I want to be a doctor.

phrases.fa: صادقانه بگویم / اگر راستش را بخواهید

are.def: second-person singular and plural present of 'be'

have.def: to own, possess, or hold something

do.def: to perform an action or activity

example.en: I do my homework every day.
example.fa: من هر روز تکالیفم را انجام می‌دهم.

example.en: He does his work very well.
example.fa: او کارش را خیلی خوب انجام می‌دهد.

work.def: to do a job or task that needs effort

example.fa: من در یک اداره کار می‌کنم.

go.def: to move from one place to another

come.def: to move toward or arrive at a place

example.en: Can you come to my office?

get.def: to receive, obtain, or reach a state

example.fa: من بعد از کار خسته می‌شوم.

phrasal_verbs.fa: جبران کردن / آرایش کردن / ابداع کردن

use.def: to put something into service for a purpose

example.fa: می‌توانم از تلفن شما استفاده کنم؟

need.def: to require something because it is essential

example.fa: من به مقداری آب نیاز دارم.

want.def: to have a desire for something

like.def: to enjoy or approve of something

example.fa: من این رنگ را دوست دارم.

love.def: to have a very strong feeling of affection

example.fa: من خانواده‌ام را دوست دارم (عاشقشان هستم).

help.def: to make it easier for someone to do something

example.en: Can you help me with this?
example.fa: می‌توانی در این کار به من کمک کنی؟

phrasal_verbs.fa: کمک کردن (به خصوص در شرایط سخت)

try.def: to make an attempt to do something

example.fa: من تمام تلاشم را خواهم کرد.

phrases.fa: یک امتحانی بکن / شانس خود را امتحان کن

say.def: to speak words to communicate something

ask.def: to say something to get an answer or help

example.en: I need to ask a question.

phrases.fa: اگر از من بپرسی (به نظر من)

phrasal_verbs.fa: کسی را به قرار دعوت کردن

answer.def: to say or write something back to a question

talk.def: to speak to someone about something

example.en: We need to talk about it.
example.fa: ما باید درباره آن صحبت کنیم.

speak.def: to use your voice to say words

see.def: to notice or look at something with your eyes

example.en: I see a bird in the tree.
example.fa: من یک پرنده در درخت می‌بینم.

look.def: to direct your eyes toward something

hear.def: to receive sound with your ears

phrasal_verbs.fa: تا آخر گوش دادن به حرف کسی

phrases.fa: حواستان را جمع کنید / گوش کنید

phrasal_verbs.fa: استراق سمع کردن / پنهانی گوش دادن

feel.def: to experience an emotion or physical sensation

phrasal_verbs.fa: حال و حوصله کاری را داشتن

think.def: to use your mind to consider something

know.def: to have information or be familiar with someone

live.def: to have your home in a particular place

stay.def: to continue to be in a place

leave.def: to go away from a place or person

example.en: What time do you leave work?
example.fa: چه ساعتی محل کار را ترک می‌کنی؟

move.def: to change position or go to a new home

example.en: We are moving to a new house.
example.fa: ما داریم به یک خانه جدید نقل‌مکان می‌کنیم.

phrasal_verbs.fa: به موضوع بعدی رفتن / ادامه دادن زندگی

example.en: The streets are full of people.
She is a very kind person.

friend.def: a person you know and like

family.def: a group of people related to each other

job.def: the regular work that you do for money

example.en: I'm looking for a new job.
example.fa: من دنبال یک شغل جدید هستم.

work_noun.def: effort used to do something; a place of employment

example.en: I have a lot of work to do.
example.fa: من کارهای زیادی برای انجام دادن دارم.

money.def: coins or notes used to buy things

example.en: I need some money for the taxi.
example.fa: من مقداری پول برای تاکسی نیاز دارم.

example.en: I work five days a week.
example.fa: من پنج روز در هفته کار می‌کنم.

later.def: at a time in the future

early.def: before the usual or expected time

example.en: I wake up early in the morning.

late.def: after the usual or expected time

phrases.fa: دیر رسیدن بهتر از هرگز نرسیدن است

here.def: in, at, or to this place

there.def: in, at, or to that place

example.fa: من الان دارم به خانه می‌روم.

phrases.fa: اینجا را خانه خودتان بدانید (راحت باشید)

example.en: I love living in this city.
example.fa: من زندگی در این شهر را دوست دارم.

country.def: a nation or land outside towns and cities

school.def: a place where children go to be educated

example.en: My kids go to school by bus.
example.fa: بچه‌های من با اتوبوس به مدرسه می‌روند.

office.def: a room or building where people work at desks

example.en: Our office is on the third floor.
example.fa: دفتر ما در طبقه سوم است.

shop.def: a place where you buy things

phrases.fa: در جمع دوستانه حرف کاری زدن

street.def: a public road in a city or town

example.fa: او آن طرف خیابان زندگی می‌کند.

phrases.fa: پشیمان بودن / حس بدی داشتن بابت

hard.def: difficult to do or understand; solid

example.en: They live in a big house.
example.fa: آن‌ها در یک خانه بزرگ زندگی می‌کنند.

old.def: having lived or existed for a long time

phrases.fa: همچنین برای شما (در جواب آرزوی خوب)

busy.def: working hard or full of activity

phrases.fa: به مشکل خوردن / اشتباه پیش رفتن

possible.def: able to be done or happen

example.en: Is it possible to call later?
example.fa: آیا ممکن است بعداً تماس بگیرید؟

collocations.fa: در اسرع وقت (تا جای ممکن زود)

and.def: used to connect words or parts of sentences

example.fa: من قهوه و چای دوست دارم.
من به خاطر ترافیک دیر کردم.

so.def: for that reason; to a great degree

example.en: I was tired, so I went to bed.
example.fa: خسته بودم، پس به رختخواب رفتم.

if.def: used to talk about a result of a condition

example.en: Call me if you need help.
example.fa: اگر به کمک نیاز داشتی با من تماس بگیر.

when.def: at what time; at the time that

example.en: I'll call you when I arrive.
example.fa: وقتی رسیدم با تو تماس می‌گیرم.
قبل از شام دست‌هایت را بشوی.

for.def: intended to be given to or used by; during

from.def: starting point of a place, time, or source

phrases.fa: از سیر تا پیاز / از اول تا آخر

to.def: in the direction of; used with verbs

in.def: inside a container, place, or time

on.def: on top of; used for days and dates

example.en: The book is on the table.

at.def: used to show a place or time

example.en: The color of the car is red.

this.def: the person or thing close to the speaker

that.def: the person or thing not close; used to connect clauses

example.en: I want to tell you something.
There is nothing in the box.

one.def: the number 1; a single person or thing

many.def: a large number of (for countable things)

example.fa: افراد زیادی این فیلم را دوست دارند.

a_lot.def: a large amount or number of something

example.en: I have a lot of work today.

example.fa: من به زمان بیشتری نیاز دارم.

example.en: Eat more fruit and less sugar.
example.fa: میوه بیشتر و شکر کمتری بخور.

all.def: every one of a group; the whole amount

example.fa: من به مقداری کمک نیاز دارم.

any.def: some, or every; used in questions and negatives

phrases.fa: در هر صورت / به هر تقدیر

other.def: used to refer to things or people that are different

example.en: I have other things to do.
example.fa: من کارهای دیگری برای انجام دادن دارم.

example.en: Would you like another cup of tea?
example.fa: یک فنجان چای دیگر میل دارید؟

kind.def: a group with similar qualities; caring about others

example.en: What kind of music do you like?

morning.def: the early part of the day

afternoon.def: the part of the day between noon and evening

evening.def: the late part of the day and early part of the night

example.en: We usually watch TV in the evening.
example.fa: ما معمولاً عصرها تلویزیون تماشا می‌کنیم.

night.def: the time when it is dark and people sleep

usually.def: in the way that most often happens

example.en: I usually go to work by car.
example.fa: من معمولاً با ماشین به سر کار می‌روم.

sometimes.def: on some occasions but not always

example.fa: هر چند وقت یک‌بار (اغلب چقدر) ورزش می‌کنی؟

never.def: at no time in the past or future

phrases.fa: دیر رسیدن بهتر از هرگز نرسیدن است

slow.def: moving or happening at a low speed

very.def: used to emphasize an adjective or adverb

really.def: in fact; used to emphasize a statement

example.fa: من واقعاً این مکان را دوست دارم.

just.def: only; a very short time ago

example.en: She is a teacher and also a writer.
example.fa: او یک معلم و همچنین یک نویسنده است.

maybe.def: used to show that something is possible

yes.def: used to give a positive answer

no.def: used to give a negative answer

collocations.fa: اصلاً راه ندارد / به هیچ وجه

okay.def: used to show agreement or that something is fine

please.def: used to be polite when asking for something

thanks.def: used to show that you are grateful

welcome.def: used to greet someone or respond to thanks

question.def: a sentence or phrase used to find out information

example.en: I have a question for you.
example.fa: من یک سوال از شما دارم.

problem.def: a situation that needs a solution

example.en: What is the reason for this?

way.def: a path or a method of doing something

example.fa: راه را به من نشان بده.

example.en: This is the best part of the movie.

life.def: the period from birth to death

world.def: the earth and everything on it

example.en: I want to travel the world.
example.fa: من می‌خواهم به کل دنیا سفر کنم.

workday.def: a day on which work is done

example.en: I have a long workday today.

break.def: a pause in work or activity

rest.def: period of relaxing; what is left

example.fa: تو به مقداری استراحت نیاز داری.

plan.def: an arrangement for doing something later

example.en: Do you have a plan for tomorrow?
I need to change my clothes.

result.def: something that happens because of something else

example.def: something that shows what a group is like

example.en: Can you give me an example?
example.fa: می‌توانی یک مثال به من بزنی؟

point.def: an idea or opinion; a mark in a game

level.def: a position on a scale of amount or quality

finish.def: to reach the end of something

example.fa: من به زودی کارم را تمام می‌کنم.

phrasal_verbs.fa: کاملاً تمام کردن / ترتیب چیزی را دادن

wait.def: to stay in a place until something happens

phrases.fa: صبر کن و ببین (زمان نشان می‌دهد)

meet.def: to come together with someone at a place

phrases.fa: سازش کردن / با هم کنار آمدن

call.def: to give a name to someone; to phone someone

phrases.fa: کار را تعطیل کردن (برای امروز کافی است)

open.def: not closed; to move something so that an opening is not blocked

phrasal_verbs.fa: درددل کردن / سفره دل باز کردن

close.def: to move something to cover an opening; near in distance

example.en: Don't forget to close the door.

buy.def: to get something by paying money for it

example.en: I want to buy a new laptop.

pay.def: to give money for something you buy

example.en: Can I pay by credit card?
example.fa: آیا می‌توانم با کارت اعتباری پرداخت کنم؟

bring.def: to take someone or something with you to a place

phrasal_verbs.fa: مطرح کردن یک موضوع / پرورش دادن فرزند

take.def: to move something from one place to another

keep.def: to have or continue to have something

example.fa: لطفاً بقیه پول را نگه دارید (انعام).

example.en: Can you give me a hand?

receive.def: to get something that is given or sent to you

example.fa: من امروز یک ایمیل دریافت کردم.

learn.def: to get knowledge or skill in something

teach.def: to give someone knowledge or skills

example.fa: او در مدرسه ریاضی درس می‌دهد.

phrases.fa: تا تو باشی که دیگه ... (درس عبرت)

practice.def: to do something regularly to become better

example.en: You need to practice every day.
example.fa: تو باید هر روز تمرین کنی.

understand.def: to know the meaning of something

remember.def: to keep a piece of information in your mind

example.fa: یادت باشد در را قفل کنی.

forget.def: to be unable to remember something

believe.def: to think that something is true

example.en: I hope to see you soon.
